adjective.description: Done, produced, or occurring once every quarter of a year.
examples: a quarterly newsletter is distributed to members

adjective.description: (of a shield or charge) divided into four (or occasionally more) subdivisions by vertical and horizontal lines.

adverb.description: Once every quarter of a year.
In the four, or in two diagonally opposite, quarters of a shield.

noun.description: A magazine or journal that is published four times a year.
